name: You
text: Phew! That was so scary. I don't want to do that again.

name: Dad
text: Fortunately, none of us are injured.

name: Sister
text: Kuya, is it okay now? Is it?

name: You
text: We don't know if there's more of those infected wandering around so I suggest we pick up the pace.

name: Narrator
text: After having a fierce battle with the mutated creature called Livid, they have sucessfully secured the bunker.

name: Narrator
text: Will they be able to continue living in peace in this bunker? Or will they be pestered further by the infected?
